name: Global X Conservative Asset Allocation ETF
longDescription: In order to achieve its investment objective, the ETF primarily invests in exchange traded funds that provide exposure to a globally diversified portfolio of fixed income and equity securities. The Manager seeks to maintain a long-term strategic asset allocation of approximately 40 percent equity securities and 60 percent fixed income securities (under normal market conditions). HCON seeks to provide a combination of income and moderate longterm capital growth, primarily by investing in exchange traded funds that provide exposure to a globally diversified portfolio of fixed income and equity securities.
